Congratulations to Alyson Pence for placing 1st in District 4 Ohio FFA Sheep Proficiency! She also placed 6th in the Ohio FFA Sheep Proficiency area. Alyson owns and operates a market lamb business and registered breeding flock. Since her grandfather introduced her to the lamb industry, she has fallen in love with the opportunity to compete in the show ring and to raise a lamb from birth to maturity. Alyson has worked over 1200 hours the past 4 years and has earned over $17,000 throughout her project.

Her current flock consists of ten brood ewes which are Shrophires registered through the American Shropshire Association. Alyson plans to attend Terra Community College to study agronomy. She plans to maintain her purebred sheep flock. She is supported by her parents, Kara and Jay Pence.

Way to go, Aly! We are very proud of you!
